com.adobe.cq.social.commons.comments.listing

Interface CommentSocialComponentList

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object>, java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Object>, java.util.List<java.lang.Object>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CalendarEventSocialComponentList, CommentSocialComponentQueryableList

    public interface CommentSocialComponentList
extends java.util.List<java.lang.Object>
    A collection of a comments. This interface is used by a CommentCollection, or a Comment to store its children.
